cleanerTask - package cleanerTask
 
ClientType - Enum in beans
for the log-in method in the singleton of coupon system;
ClientURLFilter - Class in webServices
 
ClientURLFilter() - Constructor for class webServices.ClientURLFilter
 
closing - Variable in class connectionPool.ConnectionPool
 
clousAllConnection() - Method in class connectionPool.ConnectionPool
in this method first the system will stop giving connections and wait for all the connections to come back and than close them all .
Company - Class in beans
this is the object for making companies.
Company() - Constructor for class beans.Company
 
Company(long, String, String, String) - Constructor for class beans.Company
 
Company(String, String, String) - Constructor for class beans.Company
 
Company_Rest_Facade - Class in webServices
 
Company_Rest_Facade() - Constructor for class webServices.Company_Rest_Facade
 
companyCouponAppdate(long, long) - Method in class dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
this is additional methods to handle the join tabels
CompanyDAO - Interface in dao
in the Dao layer you get only the headlines of the methods.
CompanyDaoDb - Class in dao.db
there is no business logic in this layer. only CRUD (create,read,update and delete) methods and simple methods that will be in use in the facade layer according to the customer needs.
CompanyDaoDb() - Constructor for class dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
 
CompanyFacade - Class in facade
here all the methods from the dao.db will be used in order to create an easy access to the system for the companies who use the system . this is the layer for the business logic .
CompanyFacade() - Constructor for class facade.CompanyFacade
 
connectionPool - package connectionPool
 
ConnectionPool - Class in connectionPool
the connectionPool have 10 connections , every method start with taking one connection and finished with returning the connection .
contextLoads() - Method in class pac.CouponSystemApplicationTests
 
Coupon - Class in beans
this is the object for making coupons.
Coupon() - Constructor for class beans.Coupon

Coupon(String, Date, Date, int, CouponType, String, double, String) - Constructor for class beans.Coupon
 
CouponClientFacade - Interface in facade
we use this general interface in the log-in in the coupon system singleton
CouponDAO - Interface in dao
in the Dao layer you get only the headlines of the methods.
CouponDaoDb - Class in dao.db
there is no business logic in this layer. only CRUD (create,read,update and delete) methods and simple methods that will be in use in the facade layer according to the user needs.
CouponDaoDb() - Constructor for class dao.db.CouponDaoDb
 
CouponSystem - Class in singleton
the CouponSystem is a singleton that give access to the rest of the system and start and finish the cleaner thread that remove all the expired coupons .
CouponSystemApplication - Class in webServices
 
CouponSystemApplication() - Constructor for class webServices.CouponSystemApplication
 
CouponSystemApplicationTests - Class in pac
 
CouponSystemApplicationTests() - Constructor for class pac.CouponSystemApplicationTests
 
CouponSystemException - Exception in exceptions
this is the exception for the couponSystem

CouponSystemException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception exceptions.CouponSystemException
 
CouponType - Enum in beans
for building coupon you need a type ;
creat(Customer) - Method in interface dao.CustomerDAO
 
creat(Customer) - Method in class dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
* every customer get a unique id from the sql table in the database the generated key(id) will be embedded in the customer.
creatCustomer(Customer) - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
only admin can create a customer (if the customer name is unique) .
creatCustomer(Customer, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Admin_Rest_Facade
this method get (using post) customer bean from the admin user and save it in the data base .
create(Company) - Method in interface dao.CompanyDAO
 
create(Coupon) - Method in interface dao.CouponDAO
 
create(Company) - Method in class dao.db.CompanyDaoDb
the company will get the id from the tabel and not from the user so its will be unique
create(Coupon) - Method in class dao.db.CouponDaoDb
every coupon get a unique id from the sql table in the database the generated key(id) will be embedded in the coupon.
create.db - package create.db
 
createCompany(Company) - Method in class facade.AdminFacade
only the admin can create a company user . only if the name chosen for the company is unique
CreateCompany(Company, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Admin_Rest_Facade
this rest method get (post method) company bean from the front-end and send it to the data base.
createCoupon(Coupon) - Method in class facade.CompanyFacade
we are checking that the coupon title is unique before we let the company create the coupon.
createCoupon(Coupon, HttpServletRequest) - Method in class webServices.Company_Rest_Facade
this method get coupon bean from the user and save it in the database .
CreateTabels - Class in create.db
this was used in the beginning to create the tables in the data base.
CreateTabels() - Constructor for class create.db.CreateTabels
 
Customer - Class in beans
this is the object for making customers users.

customerCouponAppdate(long, long) - Method in class dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
from this method on this is additional methods all those 3 methods are handling the join tables.
CustomerDAO - Interface in dao
in the Dao layer you get only the headlines of the methods.
CustomerDaoDb - Class in dao.db
there is no business logic in this layer. only CRUD (create,read,update and delete) methods and simple methods that will be in use in the facade layer according to the customer needs.
CustomerDaoDb() - Constructor for class dao.db.CustomerDaoDb
 
CustomerFacade - Class in facade
the customer facade is more complicated methods that use the methods from the dao.db layer in a way that separate the access to the database from the client .
CustomerFacade() - Constructor for class facade.CustomerFacade
